changelog: Project Profiles:
Breaking changes, continued reworking the example project profiles
Forced example profile re-seed (on update to 25.49.2)
Column names can freely be modified, but must be unique
User Interface:
'Open Working Directory' button changed into 'Reveal OUTPUT Folder'
Added a native-style “Recent Files” submenu, stores 10 recent items
Settings (or user preferences) pane added:
Organize outputs by project name (OUTPUT/<project>/...)
Ask before replacing the current project
macOS-only appearance preference (auto/light/dark)
Restore previous session on launch
Check for updates on launch
Validation:
Introduced user definable 'ignore-tag' that can be applied to APs to be excluded from Validation tests, they are not ignored by Summary functions
Added a severity config parameter for user customisation of tests
Added Survey Validation with handful of tests
Summarise:
Area requirement assignments now render as indented bullet lists
Channel lists are now 'naturally sorted' by channel number
Channel lists now insert a blank line when moving between UNII bands
My AP Summary now shows all rows without truncation
Floor labels use 'No location' instead of 'Unknown floor'
Asset Creation:
Project stamp now works in Zoomed AP mode and applies to every zoomed AP image
Added drag-to-pan support so zoomed maps can be repositioned with click-drag when the bitmap is larger than the viewport
Map Visualiser offers hints to assist with keyboard interaction
License Manager:
Added more user facing error messages
Limited mode continued efforts
PDS Creation:
PDS Projects now default to '_PDS' appendix
Survey Export:
AP image export now sorts more intentionally: by floor, then AP name (then id)

comment: Initial release
Licensing flow reworked: local licence storage, activation/refresh against the server, GUI management dialog, recent async/timeouts so the UI stays responsive even when offline.
Project profiles will be seeded into user documents, made tracking updates optional, validation/test configuration moved into project profiles.
Platform and packaging tweaks: paths now respect platformdirs, user assets live under Documents, bundle identifiers/app names adjusted.
General hygiene: unused code and imports removed, directory moves completed.
Logging implemented for diagnostics and user support.
Welcome/version messaging, cleaner activity console/menu layout.
UI Changes
Rearranged UI elements for better usability:
Create PDS project moved from tab3 to tab2
Moved Project Profile selector out of tabbed view
Adjusted tab order of buttons for more logical flow
Unified and improved OUTPUT file logic:
renamed AP projects now append the date/time to the output filename
Added logic surrounding AP_RENAMED project files to prevent nested OUTPUT dirs
PDS project export now uses OUTPUT/PDS Projects folder for consistency
AP Renamer:
Mechanism and Visualiser restructured
Window may now be resized
Project Profiles:
Added Project Profiles item to menu bar
Example profiles can now be removed, BWT will not automatically reseed them
Example profiles can be restored at any time from the Project Profiles menu
Project Profile list can be refreshed without restarting the app
Added 'pre-release' identifier to the Application Window
Added 'Unlicensed' identifier to the Application Window when no valid licence is present
Rearranged Predictive Design Rename buttons, placing Visualiser above 'action' buttons
Added Windows trust bridge, so that activation/validation calls honour the local certificate store
Improved error handling messaging surrounding licence activation/validation failures
Project data type protections added along with more friendly messaging:
AP Images
Note Images
Surveyed AP List
Validate simulated AP project
Duplicate AP Name handling improved, dicts now keyed with AP ID rather than name
Preventing data loss when duplicate names are present
Appending characters to duplicated name logic removed
Summarise simulated AP data
Decoupled summarisation from project profile, while retaining tag key / value totals
Added duplicate names to summary report
Added vendor model counts to summary report
Added mount type counts to summary report
Added tilt value counts to summary report
Rename Patterns
New user dir added to Documents/BadgerWiFi-Tools
Rename pattern options added to menu bar
Renamed the AP rename patterns
New mechanism for Rows and Columns
AP colour sort rename pattern added
tag-key: value sorting pattern added
AP Rename Visualiser
Added handling for default coloured APs
Added floor order control / customisation
floor order changes will persist until BWT is closed or the session is reset
Introduced UP/DOWN navigation buttons
Added a concise summary when you close the visualiser
Visualiser can now handle vector floorplan projects
User Interface
Abort handling tightened up
'Unable to reach the update server' message added, while logging the raw traceback
Validate function
All tests now show PASS / FAIL / CAUTION no silent results
Test results emojified
Renamed a few tests for clarity
Profile override PASS/FAIL messaging now possible
Added vector floorplan detection test
Added concise header to test result with emoji key
License mechanism:
Changed method for requesting computer name
Toned down overly aggressive remove license file behavior
Map Creation:
Addressed colour dictionary to handle default coloured APs
AP Rename Visualiser:
Brought back Auto Rows/Columns (previously Dynamic Rows/Columns)
Auto R/C now encompasses the first AP rather than starting at it
Introduced Manual Rows/Columns to differentiate from Auto Rows/Columns
Manual R/C canvas is always in edit mode, no extra button needed to enter edit mode
Added 'Add / Clear' Separators button to Manual R/C to speed up adding multiple separators
Reorder floors action moved into the floor selection dropdown
Navigate up / down buttons now grey out when at the top / bottom of the list
Added dedicated Model Priority pattern
Rename Strategy displays information in the activity console on pattern selection / edit
Visualiser respects the start number from the main window
Survey Summary:
Introduced All APs summary function
Introduced My APs summary function
Dressed up summary output with emoji, to get some colour into the wall of text
User Interface:
Update dialog now renders bullet points more cleanly
Rename AP Visualiser window title and button label updated
Close Visualiser button replaces previous Dismiss button
Esc key now closes the AP Rename Visualiser window
Silent update check on launch is now asynchronous to prevent UI slowdown
Auto Scroll to top of activity console introduced with Validate and Summarise actions
Validate and Summarise actions now produce .txt file output in OUTPUT/reports
Map Creation Visualiser:
Introduced visualiser to preview AP icon size and text label size before generating maps
Added zoom controls
Panning map with arrow keys
AP Rename Patterns:
XLSX export/import
Introduced, enabling bulk rename from 'old name' to 'new name' via Excel
This should work for both Predictive Design and Surveyed AP projects
XLSX also includes AP ID for unambiguous identification, this way duplicate names can be handled safely
Sweep X and Sweep Y renamed to keep patterns together in alphabetical list
Project Profiles:
Removed 'optional-tags' this parameter is no longer needed
Summarise:
Added area & exclusion area calculations to summary
License Manager:
Unified field order in licensed / unlicensed states
Addressed window size on Windows (ha ha)
LM no longer auto closes after activation / license removal
ESC will dismiss LM window
License key input will be assesed to prevent non-conforming keys being sent to license server
General Improvements:
Guarded against crash if executed on Linux (somehow)
Renamer hardened against missing location / floor data
AP List generators hardened against missing JSON assets
Hardened update check failure
Improved messaging surrounding activation / validation failure
Area Maps:
Experimental map exporter introduced to quickly assess area / exclusion area definition
Display total square metres considered in-scope on map
AP Lists now output to a dir called "AP Lists" within OUTPUT
User Interface:
Cleaned up, restructured and emojified most console messages
Rename Visualiser button disables when XLSX rename pattern is selected
Replaced Asset Creator button row with dropdown selector
PDS projects can be created with original maps or PDS maps
Centralised and standardised process completion message
Map Visualiser:
Map Visualiser button disables when irrelevant style is selected
Sidebar added to hold parameter input boxes and controls
Map Style selector added
Added ability to step through APs when Zoomed AP style is selected
Draw visible square boundary around Zoomed AP in accordance with crop parameter
Zoomed AP style control visibility and opacity of 'other APs'
Summary of configured parameters printed to activity console on Map Style change / Visualiser close
Bug Fix:
Missing dependency openpyxl added to bundle
Project Profiles:
Breaking changes, re-arranged the example profiles
Forced re-seed example profiles (only on update to 25.49.1)
AP List columns respect the sequence defined in project profile
Rename AP Patterns:
Forced re-seed Rename AP patterns (only on update to 25.49.1)
XLSX export/import
Flow requires user interaction with the 'Rename APs' button
Prints AP Name mappings to activity console
User Interface:
Many, many activity console messages emojified
Effort towards centralising and standardising common function messages
Project Profiles and Rename Pattern drop-down auto refresh, removed this action from the menu bar
Validation:
AP name format is now defined within project profile
Coverage Requirement Validation
Requires the coverage profile to be specified within test token parameters
Displays significant parameter matches and values in test results
Area Coverage Requirement Assignment
Test renamed to be more descriptive
Does not jump to the start of test results
Summarise:
Added coverage requirement assignment (simulated and survey)
Project data block suppressed in 'My AP Summary' output (survey)
Added tag-key total value when tag-value variations are greater than 1
Asset Creation:
AP Location Map generator can run with simulated and/or surveyed AP data.
Added Simulated and Survey AP checkboxes to appropriate map styles
Added checkbox option for the project name stamp
Visualiser lists all map styles
Separator line numbers are nudged, so they no longer overlap the line they represent
License Manager:
Window size re-addressed on Windows to try and prevent the 'crushed button' effect
Re-worked 'limited mode', app is now more functional when unlicensed
